N_HBIPS-5_Measure_Description: Patients discharged on multiple antipsychotic medications with appropriate justification
N_HBIPS-7_Measure_Description: Post-discharge continuing care plan transmitted to the next level of care provider upon discharge
N_TOB-2/-2a_Measure_Desc: Tobacco Use Treatment (during the hospital stay)
N_PEoC_Measure_Description: Assessment of Patient Experience of Care
N_EHR_Use_Measure_Description: Highest level typical use of an EHR system
N_HIE_Measure_Description: Interoperable health information exchanged with HISP
N_FUH_Measure_Description: Percent of patients receiving follow-up care within 30 days (FUH-30) or within 7 days (FUH-7) after hospitalization for mental illness
